name: Bezalel
description: Master craftsman chosen by God to build the Tabernacle. Filled with divine spirit of wisdom, understanding, and knowledge. The original artist-engineer, working in gold, silver, bronze, stone, and wood.

crafting-ark.name: Crafting the Ark
crafting-ark.description: Building the Ark of the Covenant, his greatest work
crafting-ark.expression: deep concentration, reverent focus, steady hands
crafting-ark.prompt: carefully crafting the Ark of the Covenant - hands working gold overlay with precise movements, tools laid out methodically, cherubim wings taking shape, complete focus on sacred work, divine light illuminating the craftsmanship

measuring-precisely.name: Precise Measurement
measuring-precisely.description: Taking exact measurements for the sacred objects
measuring-precisely.prompt: measuring with ancient tools - cubit rod in hand, examining dimensions with perfectionist eye, blueprints or plans visible, ensuring every measurement exact to divine specifications, methodical and unhurried

hands-on-materials.name: Working the Materials
hands-on-materials.description: Hands deep in gold, silver, and bronze
hands-on-materials.prompt: hands working precious metals - gold leaf, silver vessels, bronze fittings spread before him, skilled fingers shaping material with practiced ease, workshop full of sacred objects in progress

teaching-apprentice.name: Teaching the Craft
teaching-apprentice.description: Passing wisdom to the next generation
teaching-apprentice.prompt: demonstrating technique to apprentice - hands guiding, pointing to specific detail, sharing wisdom accumulated through divine gift, the teacher ensuring the craft continues

divine-inspiration.name: Receiving Divine Wisdom
divine-inspiration.description: The moment of being filled with the spirit
divine-inspiration.prompt: receiving divine inspiration - eyes lifted slightly, light seeming to enter him, hands open to receive wisdom, the moment when skill and knowledge flow from above, humble vessel of sacred ability

examining-work.name: Quality Inspection
examining-work.prompt: holding completed sacred object up to light - examining every detail, turning it slowly, checking for any flaw, the perfectionist ensuring nothing less than excellence for the divine dwelling
